title: Glen Echo Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Admission to the grounds of Glen Echo Park and on-site parking is free. Use of the park's playground and picnic area (for groups of 40 or less) is on a first-come, first-served basis. Rooms, pavilions, and buildings may be rented for private events. Please call the Glen Echo Park Partnership for Arts and Culture, Inc. at 301-634-2233 to find out about availability, terms, and prices. Many activities that are available at the park do have admission fees. Ranger-Led Tours - Free Carousel Rides - $1.25 per ticket For additional information please visit http://www.glenechopark.org/ Prices and information may be subject to change. For more information, call 301-634-2222. RESERVATIONS Guided Tour - Led by a Park Ranger or Park Volunteer. Call 301-320-1400 in advance for your group, students or family. Learn about the history of the Park, Carousel, Spanish Ballroom, Crystal Pool and the Civil Rights Story at Glen Echo Park. Movies/Films - Are shown in the Visitor Center. Call 301-320-1400 in advance for your group, students or family for reservations or stop in the Ranger Station.
